en: Hola, Profesor. Aquí el coronel Tamayo.

vi: Giáo sư, đây là Tamayo.

en: Le sorprenderá que le hable desde la radio de su banda.

pa: Like the Rolling Stones.

pa: So I recommend you start looking for

because we're coming for ya.

pa: I'm turning myself in.

pa: Yeah.
This is Colonel Tamayo.

Todo estará perdido. No hay vuelta atrás, pero ahora…

Everything would be lost.
 There'd be no turning back. But right now…

Right now, we still have a chance.
 One in a million, but we might still have it.

pa: -I need you to find the gold.

pa: Jesus Christ.

pa:
the master move.
 Are you fucking high?

between organized crime families.
 -I don't know. -All you have to do is find some robbers.

But more importantly,

pa: Yeah.

I can't take any of our cars,
 they're connected and geolocalized, but that one…
